New York City is currently under a state of emergency due to a lingering nor'easter, while various incidents, including a stabbing in Hell's Kitchen and a glass window falling from a skyscraper, highlight ongoing safety concerns; additionally, Broadway musicians are considering a strike amidst a contentious mayoral race.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC, Long Island, and Westchester County under state of emergency as nor'easter persists. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipgFBVV95cUxOSnhZbXppaWtNQnU1ZVVMVUJyZTRzaTVycFF5ME15RWFnQ29URk51eXNlb3FPWGlzakRGYWVQUF8weVVZTWY4OEZ5dm9VZVZGQzZMV3k4ZVhzblVXV2MyNDZRRVdUT3VPQ1JaVEVmcGIzT3NxejJwRzE0LTNXSUY3eDl3UHdEdERnZWxrU0hRX1JUa0s0YVZMRUpaakFxS3oxeVIzNUpn?oc=5)
- Good Samaritan stabbed while trying to stop cellphone robbery in Hell’s Kitchen. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMibEFVX3lxTE5LMU5HRk1SeEJUMk9UcUIzd2MwcUU1eU0tU3ZBVFBnWWRIVm5JVE5oU3RlREwyVlJpZ3ljcEdhaXV2eHFrSGxYX1IzYVpnTlV2V0Vmc2hnREhBeUxvbWVDSFJFVVZJSTJ2dlJ1aQ?oc=5)
- Glass window falls 400 feet from NYC skyscraper onto Midtown street, no injuries reported. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMingFBVV95cUxPSWU5UldudllrMDlTQ2pFRFpSNlo4Nzlka2ZXRW00QkdVdnZDTHlkQjkzeGdwM08zZHpoSlhkT1lOQV9DQ3NIOGxqdHFHMi1pbHZvdURpaXRkdzNfMW5IUVhZV0xGaGo1UDliTVRHOE1jR1d2alcyS3JRVERqRXU1SkVxWEg0OUltLWJCWjhUSHdDQXJ4eXBUZGtPQ2txQQ?oc=5)
